titleStmt.title: A newe herball of Macer, translated out of Laten in to Englysshe
Herbal.
titleStmt.author: Macer, Floridus, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Robert Wyer, dwellynge in Saint Martyns paryshe, at the sygne of Saynt John̄ Euangelyst, besyde Charynge Crosse],

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 17173 on UMI microfilm.
A version of STC 13175.1, published in 1525 with title: Here begynnyth a newe mater, the whiche is called an herball.
The attribution to Macer in this and in STC 13175.13c is false--STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Saint Martyns paryshe, at the sygne of Saynt John̄ Euangelyst, besyde Charynge Crosse]
